body.name: GPS Smart Watch for Men Women, Rugged Outdoor Watch with GPS and Compass, Fitness Tracker with Heart Rate Blood Oxygen Sleep Monitor, IP68 Waterproof, 1.32" Touch Screen, Compatible Android iOS iPhone
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 21 mins
features: ❤️【High-Resolution Display】 SOUYIE men's smart watch is equipped with a 1.32-inch HD round screen, boasting a remarkable 360*360 resolution for an immersive visual experience and accurate color reproduction.

❤️【Adventure Companion】 This activity fitness tracker smart watch equipped with built-in GPS and a trusty compass is your ultimate outdoor companion, guiding you through thrilling explorations. The mens sports watch offers 21 sports modes, it caters to every activity, meticulously tracking your routes, distances, speeds, calories burned, and exercise duration.

❤️【Long-lasting Power Unleash Your Potential】 The smartwatch for men and women is powered by an energy-efficient 300mAh battery, offering quick 2-hour charging and an impressive 7-day usage time, with an astonishing 30-day standby time. The smart watch compatibility with Android 5.0+ and iOS 9.0+ systems, supporting Bluetooth 4.0.

❤️【Multi-functional Smartwatch】 Embrace convenience with the rugged smart watch's dynamic features - a camera controller, music master, handy alarm clock, precise stopwatch, timely reminders to stay active, and even real-time weather updates. Plus, with IPX8 waterproofing, it's fearless against water splashes and surprises.

❤️【Comprehensive Health Monitoring Smart Watch】 Nurture a healthier lifestyle with SOUYIE smart watch's comprehensive health tracking. From monitoring your heart rate, and blood oxygen levels, to analyzing your sleep patterns, it empowers you to grasp a deeper understanding of your well-being, including valuable insights into deep sleep, light sleep, and total sleep duration.

❤️【Stay Informed, Stay Connected】 Seamlessly integrated with your smartphone, the smart watch delivers a powerful notification center to keep you updated on messages texts and emails, right on your wrist. Stay connected, and never miss a beat.

❤️【1 Year Warranty and Expert Support】 The SOUYIE Smart Watch comes with a one-year warranty to ensure your peace of mind. Count on our reliable customer service and dependable after-sales support. We are committed to ensuring your satisfaction and providing a seamless experience from start to finish. Experience the SOUYIE Sports Smart Watch — your gateway to endless possibilities!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Unleash your potential with SOUYIE fitness smart watch! Explore the World with Built-in GPS, Monitor Health with Precision Sensors, and Showcase Your Unique Style with Customizable Watch Faces. Elevate Your Journey to Wellness and Exploration with Your Perfect Companion.

Master Time with Precision Seize the Moment! Embrace the Power of Accuracy with our Smart Stopwatch and Timer. Perfect for Workouts, Cooking, or Any Activity that Requires Precision Timing. Capture Life Remotely Be the Director of Your Life! Control Your Phone's Camera Wirelessly, Capturing Perfect Shots Anytime, Anywhere. Say Goodbye to Awkward Selfies and Hello to Effortless Photography. Groove On the Go Soundtrack Your Life! Take Charge of Your Music with Seamless Control. Adjust Volume, Skip Tracks, and Immerse Yourself in Your Favorite Tunes, All from Your Wrist.

Weather Ready Stay Prepared for Every Forecast! Access Real-Time Weather Updates on Your Watch. Don't Let the Weather Catch You Off Guard — Plan Your Day with Confidence. Never Lose Sight Say Goodbye to Lost Phones! Instantly Locate Your Phone from Your Wrist. No More Frenzied Searches — Find Your Device Effortlessly and Stay Connected. Your Personal Assistant Empower Your Lifestyle! Experience the Ultimate Support System. Receive Gentle Reminders to Stand Up, Take Your Meds, and Never Miss an Important Appointment. Your Trusted Ally in Every Aspect of Your Day.

Empower Your Well-being Embark on a Journey of Total Wellness with SOUYIE smartwatch. Our Cutting-edge Features, including Blood Oxygen Monitoring, Heart Rate Tracking, and Sleep Analysis, Empower You to Gain Deep Insights into Your Body's Rhythms. Stay Mindful of Your Health and Cultivate a Balanced Lifestyle that Nurtures Your Physical and Mental Well-being.

Stay Informed, Stay Connected Stay Seamlessly Connected to Your World with the Bluetooth smart watch. Effortlessly Receive Notifications and Messages on Your Wrist, Keeping You Informed Without Distractions. Whether it's Important Updates or Messages from Loved Ones, SOUYIE S47 Smartwatch Keeps You Linked to the Pulse of Your Life.

Embrace Every Moment Embrace Every Moment with Smartwatch Versatility. From Tracking Your Daily Activities to Conquering Thrilling Outdoor Pursuits, this Smartwatch Accompanies You on Every Adventure. Navigate Confidently with Built-in GPS and Compass, Ensuring You Never Lose Your Way on the Path to Excitement and Exploration.

reviews.reviewText: I love this watch, great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is not a Global Positioning System watch
reviews.reviewText: This is advertised as a GPS (Global Positioning System) watch. It apparently is not. It only uses GPS satellites to reset time. It has no location functionality I could find. There's nothing in either the included, or online, manuals (which are quite different, and are both dysfunctional). I did get a response from their customer service when I said I could not find any location or navigation functionality. But the response was to ask for a video of the problem. Clearly, there's no meaningful way to show a video of a lack of functionality, so that was not helpful. I wrote, politely, to explain no video was applicable because I was not asking about a broken functionality, but one that I could not find, and explained that I wanted to know anything about the watches positioning, or navigation capabilities. I never received a reply. This watch provided some functionality, like a pretty good compass, but was overpriced for those limited capabilities. And the battery life was very bad if you weren't in the powersaver mode. But the watch was unreadable in the powersaving mode, and the illumination could not be increased without turning on all the other features (which presumably includes hooking up to the GPS system to get current time - too bad they didn't have an interface to display location).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Can't find the GPS function
reviews.reviewText: The watch does a great job of monitoring body functions, but the manual does not provide any direction regarding the advertised compass, map, and GPS functions. There is no website available for support.Is this truly a GPS-enabled watch?

reviews.reviewText: Finally found option for tracking activity in miles... instead of kilometers. Buried in app settings under "My". UI is not terribly user friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wanted a rounded watch face. Most surprising thing was the biod of the product which feels robust and outdoorsy as advertised. Other thing I liked: simple interface, good build, charger fits well with the watch, good battery life.
La montre est vraiment super, tout est simple juste parfait Merci pour tout

****Update **** the customer service for this company is second to none. They offered replacement or refund due to the issues with the app. Since the App is the issue they have said that their team is working in a solution. As for now I can say that this company will go far with that kind of attitude and dedication to getting better. I hope the APP will soon be an issue of the past.This is a nice-looking smartwatch. I got this one specifically cause I liked the band and well it seems pretty well all watches are coming from out of the Country and are pretty well the same so I figured hey, can't be any better or worse than the others.The watch is boxed up quite nicely, it's not fancy which is fine cause when does a smartwatch need a fancy box. You get all the normal stupp with it charging cables and a manual. The watch has many of the same functions as others including tracking your heart rate, blood oxygen levels, and more, empowering you to make informed decisions about your health and fitness.I have had a couple of watches that used the APP this one uses and it's not that great. It crashes and doesn't update. Information gets missed and lost. If you're tracking things in your life and you need the app to download and it crashes and loses your info well, that's a problem. The best way around it is to MAKE SURE you go into the APP every single day so you're only downloading 1 day of info. I have completely fixed most of the issues that many experience just by doing this. It's quite accurate to say that the APP and such in the watch are very glitchy and do not handle data well.-the battery life is fine with 4 days at heavy usage and 7 days at normal usage.- rated IP78 which is water proof can be submersed and is good for the person who never takes their watch off except to charge it.This is a decent watch there are better watches at this price point. I would say if they could get their software and glitching of the transfers along with losing data figured out then they could stay at this price point but, I can get watches with better digital function for less.

reviews.reviewTitle: good product, love the GPS and battery life
reviews.reviewText: after my purchase of the product, I have been thoroughly impressed with its performance and functionality. This rugged outdoor fitness tracker watch has quickly become an essential part of my daily life, whether I'm hitting the trails or just staying active in the city.The standout feature of this smartwatch is undoubtedly its GPS and compass functionality. As an outdoor enthusiast, I rely on accurate navigation tools, and this watch delivers on that front. The GPS tracking is incredibly precise, and the built-in compass function has been a lifesaver on numerous occasions. Whether I'm hiking in the wilderness, cycling through unfamiliar terrain, or simply trying to find my way back to my car in a crowded parking lot, this watch has been my trusty guide. The easy-to-use interface makes it a breeze to input waypoints and track my progress, and the GPS lock-on is impressively fast.One of the concerns I had when purchasing a GPS smartwatch was the battery life. I'm happy to report that this watch exceeded my expectations. With moderate use, I can easily get several days of battery life out of it. Even when using the GPS and compass functions extensively during a day-long hike, the battery still had plenty of juice left by the end of the adventure. The efficiency of the watch's power management is truly commendable and gives me the confidence to take it on extended trips without worrying about running out of battery.
It's a nice watch for a young one whi wants there first smart watch. Lots of different digital watch faces to download and change stuff up. My 12 year sons likes the watch

reviews.reviewTitle: Long lasting battery life, responsive step tracking
reviews.reviewText: I have small wrists and finding a watch and band that fit me properly and can track my steps as well as sleep cycle accurately. This one surprised me by staying on my wrist firmly and keeping the reader where it is supposed to sit.I really enjoy the fact that I can now track my sleep and exercise cycles and see exactly where I need improvement, it even tells me when I am burning calories the most or how hard my heart is beating at all times. As a person with incredibly high anxiety I am really happy that I can now see when I need to sit down and breathe.The battery life last me about 6 days before needing recharging and is easily connected through a regular usb block. I really love that I dont have to take it off in the shower or while doing chores as it's completely water proof and incredibly durable to everyday banging around.This watch is also the most low budget watch that has accurately kept track of my steps, I only wish I could track my social media with it as well.
